label: specifiedAnimalCertificate
comment: An animal certificate specified for this TT animal.
An animal certificate specified for this production facility.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.

domainIncludes.comment: A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A Track and Trace (TT) animal or a group of animals, such as those kept or raised on a farm, ranch.
